root.query: SELECT A.WORK_YY , A.ADJUST_TYPE , A.SABUN , B.NAME , C.ORG_NM , SUM(DECODE(PAY_MON,NULL,'','0','',PAY_MON)) AS PAY_MON , SUM(DECODE(BONUS_MON,NULL,'','0','',BONUS_MON)) AS BONUS_MON , SUM(DECODE(ETC_BONUS_MON,NULL,'','0','',ETC_BONUS_MON)) AS ETC_BONUS_MON , SUM(DECODE(STOCK_BUY_MON,NULL,'','0','',STOCK_BUY_MON)) AS STOCK_BUY_MON , SUM(DECODE(STOCK_UNION_MON,NULL,'','0','',STOCK_UNION_MON)) AS STOCK_UNION_MON , SUM(NVL(PAY_MON,0) + NVL(BONUS_MON,0) + NVL(ETC_BONUS_MON,0) + NVL(STOCK_BUY_MON,0) + NVL(STOCK_UNION_MON,0)) AS TOT_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_WORK_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_WORK_MON)) AS NOTAX_WORK_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_ABROAD_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_ABROAD_MON)) AS NOTAX_ABROAD_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_FOOD_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_FOOD_MON)) AS NOTAX_FOOD_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_CAR_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_CAR_MON)) AS NOTAX_CAR_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_FORN_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_FORN_MON)) AS NOTAX_FORN_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_RESEARCH_MON,'','0','',NOTAX_RESEARCH_MON)) AS NOTAX_RESEARCH_MON , SUM(DECODE(NOTAX_BABY_MON,NULL,'','0','',NOTAX_BABY_MON)) AS NOTAX_BABY_MON , SUM(NVL(NOTAX_WORK_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_ABROAD_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_FOOD_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_CAR_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_FORN_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_RESEARCH_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_BABY_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_ETC_MON,0)) AS NOTAX_TOT_MON , SUM(DECODE(PEN_MON,NULL,'','0','',PEN_MON)) AS PEN_MON , SUM(DECODE(HEL_MON,NULL,'','0','',HEL_MON)) AS HEL_MON , SUM(DECODE(EMP_MON,NULL,'','0','',EMP_MON)) AS EMP_MON , SUM(DECODE(INCOME_TAX_MON,NULL,'','0','',INCOME_TAX_MON)) AS INCOME_TAX_MON , SUM(DECODE(INHBT_TAX_MON,NULL,'','0','',INHBT_TAX_MON)) AS INHBT_TAX_MON , SUM(DECODE(RURAL_TAX_MON,NULL,'','0','',RURAL_TAX_MON)) AS RURAL_TAX_MON , (SUM(NVL(PAY_MON,0) + NVL(BONUS_MON,0) + NVL(ETC_BONUS_MON,0) + NVL(STOCK_BUY_MON,0) + NVL(STOCK_UNION_MON,0)))+( SUM(NVL(NOTAX_WORK_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_ABROAD_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_FOOD_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_CAR_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_FORN_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_RESEARCH_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_BABY_MON,0) + NVL(NOTAX_ETC_MON,0)+ NVL(NOTAX_NIGHTDUTY_MON,0))) AS TOTAL_TAX_MON , A.ENTER_CD FROM TCPN813 A, THRM100 B, TCPN811 C WHERE A.ENTER_CD = B.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = B.SABUN AND A.ENTER_CD = C.ENTER_CD AND A.SABUN = C.SABUN AND A.WORK_YY = C.WORK_YY AND A.ADJUST_TYPE = C.ADJUST_TYPE AND A.ENTER_CD = #ssnEnterCd# AND A.WORK_YY = #searchWorkYy# AND A.ADJUST_TYPE = #searchAdjustType# AND (A.SABUN LIKE '%'||#searchSbNm#||'%' OR B.NAME LIKE '%'||#searchSbNm#||'%') GROUP BY A.WORK_YY, A.ADJUST_TYPE, A.SABUN, B.NAME, C.ORG_NM, A.ENTER_CD
